mapper.insert: insert into Member_Regist (member_Id, member_Password, member_Name, member_Tel, member_Address, member_Email, member_BirthDate, member_Hint) values (#{member_Id}, #{member_Password}, #{member_Name}, #{member_Tel}, #{member_Address}, #{member_Email}, #{member_BirthDate}, #{member_Hint})
mapper.select: Select * From Member_Regist where member_Id != 'admin' ORDER BY Member_Id DESC
select * from Member_Regist where member_Id=#{member_Id} and member_Password=#{member_Password}
